articles.author: Al Jazeera Staff
articles.title: Australian soldier Ben Roberts-Smith loses war crimes suit - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: Ben Roberts-Smith had sued for defamation after newspapers reported he had murdered civilians in Afghanistan.
articles.content:
An Australian court has found that Ben Roberts-Smith, who was awarded the Victoria Cross for bravery, probably killed unarmed civilians in Afghanistan as three newspapers reported in 2018.
